data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Goal! Kerim Mrabti gives Mechelen a 1-0 lead in Mechelen.
In the minute 38, Gustav Engvall with an assist there.
Saad Agouzoul is booked for the away team.
The first half has been concluded at AFAS Stadion.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Wouter Vrancken (Mechelen) is making a first substitution, with Maryan Shved replacing Nikola Storm.
Serge Tabekou is replacing Bruno Xadas for Mouscron at AFAS Stadion.
In the minute 62, The away team have replaced Imad Faraj with Beni Badibanga. This is the second substitution made today by Jorge Simao.
Mouscron have been awarded a penalty in Mechelen...
Goal! The away team are now level through a Dimitri Mohamed penalty.
In the minute 74, Igor De Camargo is replacing Geoffry Hairemans for the home team.
Wouter Vrancken is making the team's third substitution at AFAS Stadion with Aster Vranckx replacing Gustav Engvall.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Maryan Shved.
In the minute 83, Great play from Rob Schoofs to set up the goal.
Jorge Simao is making the team's third substitution at AFAS Stadion with Charles-Andreas Brym replacing Fabrice Olinga.
The home team replace Kerim Mrabti with Onur Kaya.
In the minute 88, Jorge Simao (Mouscron) is making a fourth substitution, with Benjamin van Durmen replacing Deni Hocko.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
